names.placeOfBirth: Bronx, New York City, New York, USA
names.bio: Leonard Harris was born on September 27, 1929 in Bronx, New York City, New York, USA as Leonard Jerome Harris. He was an actor, known for Taxi Driver (1976) and Hero at Large (1980). He was married to Mary Ann Wurth. He died on August 28, 2011 in Hartford, Connecticut, USA.
names.name: Leonard Harris
